summary: SLIDING DOORS WILL NOT OPEN AT TIMES.  SERIOUS SAFETY HAZARD ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU MAY NEED TO GET CHILDREN OUT OF THE CAR.  OCCUPANTS OF THE CAR CANNOT OPEN THE DOORS FROMT HE INSIDE AT TIMES.  THE DOORS STICK SHUT AND WILL NOT OPEN.  WENT TO THE DEALER OVER SIX TIMES AND WAS TOLD EACH TIME THAT IT WAS NORMAL AND THEY WOULD LUBE THE TRACK.  THIS DOES NOT FIX THE PROBLEM AND THIS IS NOT NORMAL.  I NEED THIS FIXED BEFORE THERE IS AN ACCIDENT AND SOMEONE IS SERIOUSLY INJURED.
